intent_atoms.description: Run the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to collect latency, CPU, and memory metrics for the SwiftUI event bridge.
Benchmark must be executed on macOS hardware with Xcode 14 or newer.
Collected measurements should be archived alongside CLI throughput baselines for comparison against PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration budgets.
Use XCTest to run the benchmark, but skip scenarios where Combine is unavailable (e.g., Linux CI container).
The benchmark test LargeFileBenchmarkTests.testAppEventBridgeDeliversUpdatesWithinLatencyBudget should report XCTSkip when Combine is not available.
Surface the Linux skip status in CI dashboards or alerts to highlight macOS coverage gaps until a native runner is wired up.
